Description: Nurses For Saudi ArabiaWe are looking for nurses to promote and restore patients’ health. You will work with a variety of patients and you will provide direct nursing care along with physical or psychological support when required.• Following established protocols to keep all patients' health reports ready for accurate medical evaluation.• Work with colleagues to keep the workplace clean, sanitized, and free of contaminants.• Ensure proper medical attention to patients by taking care of routine requirements like IV fluids, injections, and other medications.• Ensure the confidentiality of all records.• Monitor and record patient’s condition and document provided care services.• Collaborates with doctors and multidisciplinary team members.Skills
Skills:
Valid passport.
Bachelor's Degree in Nursing.
English proficiency is a must.
Fresh Graduates are accepted.
qualified Fresh Graduated Nurses
